name: Chicxulub! Earth is in Danger!
description:
Description
You are Chicxulub. Floating endlessly through the entire vastness of space. You do not remember where you came from. But you do know where you are going. An arrogant planet, Earth, has unknowingly captured your ire. You will unleash fury upon it's surface.

Dash into other space rocks and smash them into little pieces. Accumulate their mass to smash other, harder space rocks.
Avoid other planets, lest you burn up in their atmospheres, and dodge their on-coming moons.

Instructions

W,A,S,D to move around the screen.
You will target the on-coming asteroids closest to your mouse.
Smash into them with Left-Click and pick up their pieces to increase your mass.

Once you accumulate enough mass you can smash into harder asteroids.

Build combos to increase the value of each asteroid piece.

Credits
Denise Lau & David Paterson

Additional Assets
Chiptone by SFBGamesPixelPlanets by Deep-Fold
Free Pixel Effects Pack by XYEZawr
Explosions Animation Pack by ansimuz

Made for My First Game Jam: Winter 2022
